articles.author: Annika Kim Constantino, Elsa Ohlen
articles.title: Nine of the largest pharma companies ink deals with Trump to lower drug prices - CNBC
articles.description: President Donald Trump has pushed to lower drug prices for Americans, which are on average nearly three times higher than overseas.
articles.content: Several of the largest U.S. and European-based drugmakers inked deals with President Donald Trump on Friday to voluntarily sell their medications for less, as his administration pushes to link the na… [+4401 chars]
